forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. North wind 5 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends quietly over Downtown San Francisco, the evening reveals a mostly clear canvas overhead, the air crisp with a gentle north wind nudging at the 47-degree mark. Although the city remains void of fog tonight, a subtle chill lingers, urging residents to embrace layered attire—a simple, lightweight jacket paired with a cozy scarf could make all the difference against the cool breeze. 

Come Saturday, the sun will stretch its golden arms across the skyline, promising a cheerful day ahead with temperatures peaking around 62, easing slightly later in the afternoon. The north wind will intensify, rustling the leaves and sending a hint of refreshment through the streets. It’ll be a splendid opportunity to enjoy a leisurely walk along the waterfront or perhaps indulge in a quiet moment at one of the many inviting cafés. Whether it’s sipping artisan coffee while watching the city weave its daily tale, or simply soaking in the sunny warmth, the day beckons with a freshness that speaks to the soul, inviting both the delight of exploration and the solace of reflection in this vibrant urban landscape.
